content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I am pleased to meet you. Please, feel free to make an offer for the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 600 euros, how does that sound to you?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That is a bit low for me. I am looking for a higher price. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still not high enough for me. I am looking for a price that truly reflects the value of my property. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, let's say 700 euros, a fair price for a city center apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate the offer, but I am looking for a price that is even higher. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, how about 750 euros? It's a generous price for a one-bedroom apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's better, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
This is already a very good price. I can't go higher than 780 euros. It's a great deal for you.
[](/usr/response/[removed])]
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
